Hey Joel,

Thanks for that, I can see the token being passed however it still looks like it's using the dev url for motorweb.
it should be
https://australia-southeast1-motorweb-prod.cloudfunctions.net/motorWeb?state=........
where as it's using
https://australia-southeast1-motorweb-dev.cloudfunctions.net/motorWeb?state=.......

You'll need to check the key that is used for recapture too, this should be set to lprod as in this document
https://withstella.notion.site/Motor-Quick-Quote-Motorweb-Search-Recaptcha-v3-5221bb527e1a4d2da67103cc1b33f83c?pvs=4

Cheers
Simon

Hi Jamie,

Sure, confirming we have updated the page. Let me know if this works for you?
https://staging-stellainsurance-dec2022.kinsta.cloud/car-insurance-quote/

Thanks Joel,

Thanks for adding this in so quickly.

We have one last request to hide the reCAPTCHA badge at bottom right of the page and instead replace this with the recommended copy from google - to be added to the disclaimer text underneath the 'Get a quick quote' button.



Details on how to hide the badge can be found on the reCAPTCHA FAQ's here https://developers.google.com/recaptcha/docs/faq. Be sure to set the badge style to visibility:hidden rather than display:none to avoid potential problems with validation.

Please let us know when this change is live so we can take one last look.

Many thanks,
Jamie

Hi Jamie,

Sure, we have now updated the staging and you can now test it.
https://staging-stellainsurance-dec2022.kinsta.cloud/car-insurance-quote/

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel and Heath,

Hope you are both well.

We are currently in the process of adding reCAPTCHA v3 to our motorweb service which is used when a motor rego lookup is made on the marketing website. This means that a reCAPTCHA token will need to be sent to the motorweb endpoint that is hit when a rego search is made during the motor quote flow.

We have put together some documentation which outlines the steps that need to be taken to get this implemented. This can be found at: https://www.notion.so/Motor-Quick-Quote-Motorweb-Search-Recaptcha-v3-5221bb527e1a4d2da67103cc1b33f83c.

We would be very grateful if you could firstly get this implemented on the staging site and let us know when finished so we can take a quick look. We will then look to orchestrate the push to live.

If you have any questions at any point, please don't hesitate to pop me an email.

Many thanks,
Jamie
